title: Strong Mac,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: "Now," said Sharon McCulloch, as he drew on his boots at six o'clock that same morning in the flagged kitchen of the House o' Muir, "let a' things be done decently and in order. James, hae ye the notices ready?

title: Strong Mac,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: "Ye will come back wi' us to House o' Muir and set the place in order a wee !" he said.
